title: Real Madrid staff and players congratulate Cristiano Ronaldo on winning Fifa best player award
text:
Real Madrid staff and players congratulate Cristiano Ronaldo on winning Fifa best player award The Portugal captain also made Fifa's team of the year - along with a few of his teammates Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Cristiano Ronaldo congratulated by teammates and staff Share this video   Thank you for subscribing!   
Cristiano Ronaldo claimed Fifa's inaugural best football player of year award on Monday night - and on Tuesday morning he was being congratulated by his Real Madrid teammates. 
The Portugal captain pipped fellow La Liga forwards Lionel Messi and Antoine Griezmann to claim the new trophy. 
He also sealed a place in Fifa's best XI - and collected a miniature version of the same trophy. 
Returning to Real Madrid training on Tuesday, Ronaldo received a very warm welcome from his club's players and staff who all congratulated him. Christiano Ronaldo (Photo: Real Madrid) (Photo: Real Madrid) 
As seen in the video above, Ronaldo and his teammates all joined in for a group photo - and allowed the main man himself to take centre stage. 
The 31-year-old was joined by Sergio Ramos, Luka Modric and Marcelo who also made the Fifa World XI. poll loading Is Ronaldo the greatest player of all-time? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
